comment:
* Encapsulates a session that can be used to control device lights and represents the lifetime
     * of the requests.

methods.name: public void requestLights(@NonNull LightsRequest request)
methods.comment:
* Sends a request to modify the states of multiple lights. * *

This method only controls lights that aren't overridden by higher-priority sessions. * Additionally, lights not controlled by this session can be controlled by lower-priority * sessions. * * @param request the settings for lights that should change

methods.name: public void close()
methods.comment: * Closes the session, reverting all changes made through it.
